REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0276 reute d f BC-MERCURY-ENTERTAINMENT 03-02 0056

TEXT.TITLE: MERCURY ENTERTAINMENT <MCRY> SEES BETTER RESULTS
TEXT.BODY: Mercury Entertainment Corp said it expects improved results in 1987. The company today reported a loss for the year ended November 30 of 413,021 dlrs on revenues of 600,971 dlrs, compared with a loss of 163,932 dlrs on revenues of 665,800 dlrs a year before. Reuter
